component.name: BBC iPlayer
component.summary: Catch up on BBC TV and Radio programmes, or watch/listen live

description.p: Watch live BBC channels, listen to BBC radios, or catch up on programmes from the last 7 days. Drama, soaps, news, sport and currents affairs, or comedy, whatever your mood, you will find a BBC programme to suit you.
To use BBC iPlayer you must be located in the UK and pay a TV licence.
This webapp provides a quick way to launch a web browser to access BBC iPlayer.
